Navigation.title: AI Tools Hub
Navigation.description: Powered by AI - Prompt optimization, code generation, smart translation, and more to help you work more efficiently.

SkiAnalysis.title: Ski Technique Analysis
SkiAnalysis.subtitle: Professional AI-powered skiing technique analysis
SkiAnalysis.invalidFormat: Invalid video format. Please upload MP4, WebM, or MOV.
SkiAnalysis.fileTooLarge: File too large. Maximum size is 2GB.
SkiAnalysis.readyDescription: Upload a video of your skiing and get professional feedback on your technique
SkiAnalysis.tips1: For best results, film from the side or following angle.
SkiAnalysis.tips2: The video should be 30 seconds to 3 minutes long.
SkiAnalysis.colorSettingsDesc: Help AI identify you in the video
SkiAnalysis.readyToAnalyzeTip: Your video is ready. Click the button below to start the analysis.
SkiAnalysis.confirmSettingsTip: You can adjust skill level and equipment colors before starting.

Footer.text: AI Tools Hub - AI-powered prompt optimization tool

HomePage.title: Discover Powerful AI Tools
HomePage.subtitle: Empower your workflow with AI-driven prompt optimization, code generation, smart translation, and more.

prompt-quiz.name: Prompt Quiz
prompt-quiz.description: Train your questioning skills through a trivia game and learn to ask more valuable questions

prompt-trainer.name: Prompt Trainer
prompt-trainer.description: Learn to ask better questions and train your questioning skills

prompt-optimizer.name: One-Click Prompt Optimizer
prompt-optimizer.description: Three-stage AI-powered prompt optimization tool to help you write better prompts

code-generator.name: Code Generator
code-generator.description: Generate code from natural language descriptions, supporting multiple programming languages

text-translator.name: Smart Translator
text-translator.description: Intelligent translation between multiple languages while preserving the original style

image-generator.name: Image Generator
image-generator.description: Generate images from descriptions, supporting multiple styles

text-summarizer.name: Text Summarizer
text-summarizer.description: Quickly generate summaries of articles and documents

ski-analysis.name: Ski Technique Analysis
ski-analysis.description: Upload your skiing video and get professional analysis with improvement suggestions

HistoryPanel.title: Prompt Records
HistoryPanel.deleteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this prompt record? This action cannot be undone.
HistoryPanel.clearDescription: Are you sure you want to delete all {count} prompt records? This action cannot be undone.

AIClientSender.title: Send to AI Client
AIClientSender.instruction: Copied! Press Cmd+V / Ctrl+V to paste in the new chat

PromptTrainer.title: Prompt Trainer
PromptTrainer.subtitle: Learn to ask better questions for more valuable AI responses
PromptTrainer.step1Desc: Choose the area you want to ask about: Learning, Work, or Life
PromptTrainer.step2Desc: AI will help clarify your needs and quantify goals through questions
PromptTrainer.step3Desc: Produce a high-quality question ready for AI
PromptTrainer.tip1: The more specific your question, the more valuable the AI response
PromptTrainer.tip2: Providing context and goals leads to more precise suggestions
PromptTrainer.questionPlaceholder: e.g., How can I learn English effectively?
PromptTrainer.ahaMoment: ðŸ’¡ Good question = Good answer! Learning to ask is a lifelong skill.

CoverGenerator.title: Xiaohongshu Cover Generator
CoverGenerator.subtitle: AI-powered professional Xiaohongshu note cover generator
CoverGenerator.referenceImagesDesc: Upload 1-5 reference images to help AI understand your desired style
CoverGenerator.styleSelectDesc: Choose a Xiaohongshu cover style that fits your content
CoverGenerator.promptDesc: Describe the cover effect you want in one sentence
CoverGenerator.promptPlaceholder: e.g., Food exploration vlog, outfit sharing, product recommendation, travel diary...

emptyState.title: No covers generated yet
emptyState.desc: Upload reference images and describe your requirements, AI will generate professional Xiaohongshu covers for you

CoverGenerator.invalidImageType: Unsupported image format. Please upload JPG, PNG, WebP, or GIF
CoverGenerator.imageTooLarge: Image too large. Maximum size is {size}MB

PromptQuiz.title: Prompt Challenge
PromptQuiz.subtitle: Train your AI prompting skills through practice
PromptQuiz.rule3: Write a prompt for AI to generate aligned content
PromptQuiz.welcomeDesc: Learn to write high-quality prompts that get the AI outputs you want
PromptQuiz.feature1Desc: Start with the answer, learn to write prompts
PromptQuiz.promptPlaceholder: Enter your prompt to generate content aligned with the answer...
PromptQuiz.optimizationTip: Tip: Try adding specific requirements to your prompt, such as word count, format, or key points.
